properties.title: Lake Constance and cruises
properties.abstract: Discover the region around Lake Constance from another perspective. No lake in Europe offers such a diverse range of excursions. Which is why it is hardly surprising that Lake Constance is also called the «Soul of Europe».
properties.description:
Why don't you give yourself a break and enjoy the fresh breeze from the lake and the unique view of the Säntis Mountain and the Alpine foothills. You could give yourself a special treat with a cruise from Kreuzlingen on the Lower Lake to Schaffhausen and a visit to the Rhine Falls, for example.

The unparalleled expanse of Lake Constance gives you the feeling of being on a sea cruise and leaves you feeling refreshed and revitalised. Why search far afield? - Lake Constance is so near!
properties.name: Thurgau Tourismus
